bibl.title: O.BM EA 20300: In Search of the Latest Dated Demotic Ostrakon.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: Theban area (?), I-II. The ostracon contains two acknowledgments of indebtedness by two different debtors in favor of the same creditor. The latest dated Demotic ostracon is rather O. Zürich 54 (223/224).
bibl.seg: 142.12 O. Lond. Inv. EA 20300 = O. Bagnall 49 145.12 O. Zürich 54
Tonio Sebastian Richter, O.BM EA 20300: In Search of the Latest Dated Demotic Ostrakon.

Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 285-290, 1 fig.

Theban area (?), I-II. The ostracon contains two acknowledgments of indebtedness by two different debtors in favor of the same creditor. The latest dated Demotic ostracon is rather O. Zürich 54 (223/224).
